item.tinkersepicfight.spear.description: The Spear is a lengthy weapon, its long range and quick pokes make for an ideal shield companion.
item.tinkersepicfight.tachi.description: The Tachi is a bloodthirsty weapon, the deep lacerations it deals make it a good choice for dealing with fast enemies.
item.tinkersepicfight.greatsword.descrip: The Greatsword is a devastating weapon, its wide sweeps and heavy hits make it great for crowd control.
item.tinkersepicfight.longsword.descript: The Longsword is a versatile weapon, It provides a balanced option for those who don't want to use a shield.
